dsOverview.title: U.S.S.R. Northern Hemisphere Surface Temperature Analyses, monthly 1891-1981

summary.p: Analyses of Northern Hemisphere surface temperature received from the U.S.S.R. as part of an agreement on the exchange of climate data.
